title: Vicious Queen
description: They told me bad things happen in threes, and they did.But what comes next?My troubles are only beginning, and those I thought I could trust might be the ones who end up breaking me.But I won’t give up.They might think I’m just a pawn, but I’ll beat them at their own game.If I want to win, a vicious queen I’ll become.
author: Becca Steele
